text: Real Madrid Castilla is a Spanish football team. It is Real Madrid's reserve team. Their home stadium (ground) is Alfredo di Stéfano Stadium. They currently play in the Segunda División B. Because it is Real Madrid's reserve team, the team can not be promoted (moved up to La Liga. == Name == * 1930-1972 AD Plus Ultra * 1972-1991 Castilla CF * 1991-2005 Real Madrid B * 2005-present Real Madrid Castilla C.F. == League position == ==Honours== *Copa del Rey :Runners-up: 1979–80 *Segunda División :Winners (1): 1983–84 *Segunda División B :Winners (4): 1990–91, 2001–02, 2004–05, 2011–12 *Tercera División :Winners (6): 1948–49, 1954–55, 1956–57, 1963–64, 1965–66, 1967–68 ==References== Category:1930 establishments in Europe Category:1930s establishments in Spain Category:Football clubs based in Madrid Category:Reserve football teams
title: Real Madrid Castilla
